# HMCharacteristicValueCurrentHeatingCooling.cool

**Case**

The accessory state indicates cooling.

## Declaration

```swift
case cool
```

## Temperature States

- **HMCharacteristicValueCurrentHeatingCooling.heat**: The accessory state indicates heating.
- **HMCharacteristicValueCurrentHeatingCooling.off**: The accessory indicates no heating or cooling.

items.description: The accessory indicates no heating or cooling.
items.name: HMCharacteristicValueCurrentHeatingCooling.off

title: HMCharacteristicValueCurrentHeatingCooling.cool
